name: Manic Miner: The Hobbit
overview: Manic Miner: The Hobbit is an unofficial remake of Manic Miner with combines the story of The Hobbit with the gameplay of Manic Miner. The game has two versions: the standard version, for people who have experience with Manic Miner games, and a beginner's version, for people who are new to Manic Miner. It was released with its companion game Jet Set Willy: The Lord of the Rings. The game is freeware and is written by Andrew Broad.
